broadwick.data

Interface DatabaseImpl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    H2Database

    public interface DatabaseImpl
extends AutoCloseable
    Interface defining the database implementations.

      Close the database connection.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open(String dbName)
        Open the database for connection.
        Parameters:
        dbName - the name of the database to open/connect.

      • close

        Close the database connection.
        Specified by:

      • getConnection

        Connection getConnection()
                         throws SQLException
        Get a connection to the database.
        Returns:
        the connection object.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the connection cannot be obtained.

      • getDialect

        org.jooq.SQLDialect getDialect()
        Obtain the database dialect e.g. SQLDialect.MYSQL or SQLDialect.H2.
        Returns:
        the SQLDialect of the database.
